CustomField.formula: IF( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE(2022,05,24) , IF(NOT( ISBLANK(Qantas_Frequent_Flyer_Number__c) ),((Total_Order_Coupons_Discount__c ) * (IF( Deal_Name__c='4254' && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) >= DATE(2023,09,27) && DATEVALUE(ordexp_purchase_date__c) <= DATE(2023,10,07), 6, 0) ) ), 0), 0)
CustomField.label: QFF Coupon Bonus Formula
